parentTypes.toXmlSchema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="root">
        <complexType>
            <sequence>
                <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
            </sequence>
        </complexType>
    </element>
</schema>

<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="Partner" type="tns:Partner"/>
    <complexType name="Partner">
        <sequence>
            <element name="name">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element name="active" type="boolean"/>
            <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
        </sequence>
    </complexType>
</schema>

properties.name: type

<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="type">
        <simpleType>
            <restriction base="string">
                <enumeration value="A"/>
                <enumeration value="B"/>
            </restriction>
        </simpleType>
    </element>
</schema>
